Starting with **Tower v3.2.1**, you can use a UVC device to pipe a video stream to the [Tower video widget](https://github.com/DroidPlanner/Tower/wiki/Tower-Widgets).


#### Notes: 
This feature has been successfully tested with:<br>
 * [`Nexus 7`](https://www.asus.com/Tablets/Nexus_7/) running on an Android Kit Kat / Lollipop / Marshmallow.<br>
 * [`Moto G 2nd Gen`](http://www.motorola.com/us/products/moto-g/) running on an Android Kit Kat / Lollipop/Marshmallow.<br>
 * [`Moto G 3rd Gen`](http://www.motorola.com/us/products/moto-g/) running on an Android Kit Kat / Lollipop/Marshmallow.<br>
 * [`Azus Zenfone 5`](https://www.asus.com/Phone/ZenFone_5_A501CG/) running on an Android Kit Kat / Lollipop.<br>
 * [`UVC Device`](http://www.ideasonboard.org/uvc/)<br>

![uvc_device01](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11425400/14295176/eb3b3cb0-fb4a-11e5-9e1c-fc95f895539c.jpg)
![uvc_device02](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11425400/14295638/d0a7b49e-fb4c-11e5-940c-98d0c620f7dc.png)
![uvc_device03](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11425400/14295637/d071ace6-fb4c-11e5-83a5-9be4d6183072.png)
* [`USB HUB OTG`](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USB_On-The-Go) to have Tower with Telemetry and FPV at the same time.<br>
![usb_hub01](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11425400/14992365/2ee94f86-113c-11e6-9288-8c4f0f7a9812.jpg)

#### Tower Guide
- Navigate to `Settings` -> `User Interface`
![settings_user_interface](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/914968/10593077/78d5c2d0-7675-11e5-8fe5-a5729c37a980.png)

- Click on `Widgets Preferences`
![widgets_preference](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/914968/10593080/78d8c930-7675-11e5-9de8-02cacdf30125.png)

- Select **UVC Video** and Deselect **Solo Video**
![widgets_list_screen](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11425400/14293895/ecfe2b4e-fb44-11e5-974f-a6961a42255e.png)

- Go back to the flight screen. If configured correctly, the video widget will start displaying the video stream from UVC device!
![video_stream_example01](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11425400/14293907/fb492852-fb44-11e5-9111-066c24038c8e.png)
![video_stream_example02](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11425400/14294656/82f30306-fb48-11e5-9653-b1905d54a6bc.png)
![video_stream_example03](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11425400/14294667/9121ca0c-fb48-11e5-85d7-6b593d9cc9e1.jpg)
